Klasse DBManager

java.lang.Object
persistence.mariaDB.DBManager
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
QuizDataInterface
public class DBManager extends Object implements QuizDataInterface
MariaDB-based implementation of the QuizDataInterface.

This class provides CRUD operations and queries for:

  • Quiz themes
  • Quiz questions
  • Quiz answers
It uses DAOs from the persistence.mariaDB.dao package to map between database table rows and DTO objects from the quizlogic.dto package.

The DBManager is a Singleton, ensuring a single shared connection is used throughout the application's lifecycle.

Connection configuration is loaded from the ConfigManager. Responsibilities:

  • Manage lifecycle of the MariaDB connection
  • Implement persistence logic declared in QuizDataInterface
  • Maintain in-memory mappings between DTOs and their associated DAOs
Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

      true if connected, false otherwise

      Parameter:
      theme - the ThemeDTO representing the theme
      Gibt zurück:
